title: BRIEF-Patterson-UTI Energy Says Entered Into Amended And Restated Credit Agreement
text:
March 27 (Reuters) - Patterson-Uti Energy Inc:
* PATTERSON-UTI ENERGY SAYS ‍ON MARCH 27, 2018, ENTERED INTO AN AMENDED AND RESTATED CREDIT AGREEMENT - SEC FILING​
* PATTERSON-UTI ENERGY INC - ‍MATURITY DATE UNDER CREDIT AGREEMENT IS MARCH 27, 2023​
* PATTERSON-UTI ENERGY - ‍CREDIT AGREEMENT IS A COMMITTED SENIOR UNSECURED REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY THAT PERMITS BORROWINGS OF UP TO $600 MILLION​ Source text - bit.ly/2GAFUK7 Further company coverage:
